description:
This was actually the first solo I shot in HD. I held off on airing it because Maverick recently had a solo. Shouldn't be a surprise to you all that I don't air vids in the order I shoot them.
But in fact Maverick is pretty much the reason I decided to dust off the High Def cameras I had been sitting on for almost a year, and the reason that more vids will be aired.
He wanted to come back and do more, but wasn't keen on even getting his dick sucked. He wanted to do another solo, but I like to spice it up with toys to keep it interesting, but he wasn't in to that either. ~sigh~
Anyway, I knew you guys would like this stud, and I DID want to experiment with the new cameras. I learned a lot (like the on board mics SUCK!).
We also did another photoshoot, and we got a bit more artsy with the shower shoots. He sure is a great smiler!
And he can nut like no other! It's like a fountain, all in glorious high def!
Enjoy!
title: Maverick - Solo
